name: Red Eyes (RareChip)
description:
Red Eyes is a game where you must run from a monster that lurks in a dungeon, whist collecting his Red Eyes...

Beat your highscore and collect as many Red Eyes as you can!

This game was created solo in one week (with some days off) for GameFlip Game Jam 2023. I had a lot of fun making it and testing out new things.

I appreciate all feedback and would gladly make updates! There were plenty of features I wanted to add but didn't have the time.

Controls:

WASD to move

SHIFT to sprint

SPACE to vault over windows
